document_data.name: Adelimer's Aural Augmenter
document_data.mainbody: '''''Adelimer's aural augmenter''''' was a unique [[alteration]] [[spell]] found in [[Jaluster's Orizon]]. This spell was developed by [[Adelimer]].
document_data.Effects: This spell was a variation of the ''[[extension I]]'' spell with a few minor differences. This spell extended the duration of elementary spells but was able to be cast in half the time as ''extension I''.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
